data.name: Space Duels
data.detailed_description: 1v1 spaceship duels with realistic physics. Players can join public or private 1v1 lobbies to engage in 1st person spaceship combat, using lasers to try and destroy their opponent's ship. Movement is especially tricky because of inertia and the lack of air resistance, and it adds an extra layer of depth to the gameplay. Good aim and a mastery of spaceship movement are necessary to win.
data.about_the_game: 1v1 spaceship duels with realistic physics. Players can join public or private 1v1 lobbies to engage in 1st person spaceship combat, using lasers to try and destroy their opponent's ship. Movement is especially tricky because of inertia and the lack of air resistance, and it adds an extra layer of depth to the gameplay. Good aim and a mastery of spaceship movement are necessary to win.
data.short_description: 1v1 online multiplayer spaceship duels with realistic physics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-4350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 | AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 35 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
